p: This CRF63_02A1 branch specific to Krasnoyarsk Krai also comprises a substantial number of HIV-1 isolates that were obtained from 2014 to 2016 in Tomsk Oblast from PWID who were using synthetic drugs. These data point to probable HIV-1 CRF63_02A1 transmission from Tomsk Oblast. Among Krasnoyarsk Krai HIV-1, which group together with viruses CRF63_02A1 isolated from Novosibirsk Oblast residents, in one case the virus was detected in PWID who arrived from Kemerovo Oblast adjacent to Novosibirsk Oblast (Krasnoyarsk 10), and in the second case in a man with HIV detected in August 2017, who reported HS (Krasnoyarsk 117).
